name: Axe
description: This is very sharp it is used especially for felling trees and chopping and splitting wood.

name: Drill Machine
description: A drilling machine, also called a drill press, is a powerful tool used to cut a round hole into or through metal, plastic, wood.

name: Hammer
description: A hammer is a tool, most often a hand tool, consisting of a weighted head fixed to a long handle that is swung to deliver an impact to a small area of an object.

name: Pliers
description: Pliers, hand-operated tool for holding and gripping small articles or for bending and cutting wire.

name: Scissor
description: Scissors, cutting instrument consisting of a pair of opposed metal blades that meet and cut when the handles at their ends are brought together.

name: Screwdriver
description: screwdriver a tool used for turning screws, usually having a handle of wood, plastic, etc, and this is the best driver.

name: Spanner
description: A spanner is a metal tool whose end fits round a nut so that you can turn it to loosen or tighten it. Usually its called monkey wrench.

name: Measure Tape
description: A tape measure, or measuring tape is a type of hand tool typically used to measure distance or size. It is like a much longer flexible ruler.

name: Wrench
description: Basically, a wrench consists of a stout lever with a notch at one or both ends for gripping the bolt or nut in such a way that it can be twisted by a pull on the wrench.
